name: Psychologist's Phone
description:
Psychologist's Phone

You work as a psychologist at Vibrant Technologies and treat people in times of a  strange pandemic.

With due distance, you make phone calls with your patients seeking help. But beware - you too will not remain free of psychological damage. Take care of yourself!

This game was created as part of the Extra Credits Game Jam #6. The theme was 'Take Care'. We were inspired by the challenges 'Extra Distance' and 'Extra Translation'.

Instructions:

Turn on the sound for the full experience!

Press Escape to pause the game.

Made by: Spyturtlestudio - a small development team from Germany, consisting of two people.
